html.body: After selecting one of the ethography modalities, choose the syntax to be used in the ethographic recording. Auto-exclusive events are used when the occurrence of a new behavioral unit necessarily ends the former. Overlapping/nested events are used when you have behavioral units that occurs during (or partially overlapped with) other states or behaviors also recorded during the session.
Click in "Start Analysis" to start the Ethography.
